step.description: Ensure that the everything.dll is loaded successfully before proceeding with any file searches.
Happy path: Search for all .txt files with default parameters to verify basic functionality.
Test limit parameter by restricting results to 5 PDF files.
Test case-sensitive search to ensure only exact-case matches are returned.
Verify full-word matching by searching for 'report' and excluding partial matches like 'reports'.
Use regex to match log files ending in .log, ensuring regex parsing works correctly.
Sort CSV files by size to test sorting functionality.
Edge case: Test server behavior when query is empty.
Edge case: Search for a file type that likely doesn't exist.
Test performance with a large result set by fetching up to 1000 files.
Test advanced search syntax by filtering files modified today.
Test size-based filtering by searching for files larger than 1MB.
Test specific file lookup using one of the known available test files.
Test search within a specific directory structure using relative path.
Test absolute path search to verify path-based queries.
